title: WEEK 3 UPDATE STILL NO CHANGE
body:
Hey guys its norbit again coming with another message,

I was recently promoted finally to s3 after hundreds of game in s4 and guess what im back at s4 hows is this possible you ask look at the people i play with oh "i think ill feed, i dont care anymore" " lets troll and i dont give a fuck anymore" " im on tilt so if i die i feed " a few prime examples of people im dealing with each and every game and what makes it worse i report and see them in the bloody same team i try and work on the things im doing bad in like cs and team objectives but how can i improve with people with this attitude muting works but to a certain extent as they will still carry on either feeding or trolling and it does not make the game as fun, this is the consistentency im getting as im going back forth in silver might as well demoted me all the way to iron as it seems like im playing with iron players and little sooks in the game all i want is to get better but with this unfairness the game it sucks

Kind regards 

Norbit1234

replies.body:
Man that really sucks. I only got promoted into S4 a few days ago and so far I have not encountered any trolls. I hope it stays that way. In Bronze though I have experienced trolls and omg they are horrible. There are also countless times where i've been matched with the same players from the previous game. It really annoys me that league does this so I always wait about 5 minutes and sometimes restart the client to make sure i don't get matched with the same people. 

I really enjoy the adc role but I'm not very good at cs so I cop some flack for it from team mates. I primarily play support now just cause i don't need to focus cs. all i have to do is keep the adc alive and everyone is happy.

Don't give up though. I have had massive lose streaks before and then I bounce back with lots of wins.
